r.s: Wrapper for shared memory and locking functionality across different extensions.
r.d: Allows you to share data across requests as long as the PHP process is running. One of APC or WinCache is required to accomplish this, with other extensions being potentially pluggable as adapters.
r.n: * Fixed the PHAR stub. * Removed the warnings APC would trigger when using SHM::factory(). * Allowed registering of external adapters with the new SHM::registerAdapter() method. * Added SHM::__invoke() as a shortcut to SHM::add().
